message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on its value of $12000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the unique features it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $9500 for you. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.
